metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38428 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.3.4.fs/ksmbd/smb2pdu.c in ksmbd does not properly check the UserName valuebecause it does not consider the address of security buffer, leading to anout-of-bounds read.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
